Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI

Class CLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI.CLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInterface, PropertyChangeListener, Runnable, EventListener
public class CLI extends Object implements Runnable, UserInterface
Class CLI is used to display the command line interface of the game

      public void printTurnMenu(List<String> actions, List<String> actionCommands, List<String> currentPossibleActions)
      printTurnMenu prints the actions that you can do during your turn and put in evidence which action you can do in that specific moment
      Specified by:
      printTurnMenu in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      actions - all the actions descriptions that the player can do
      actionCommands - all the actions command to call the actions that the player can do
      currentPossibleActions - all the actions commands of the actions that the client can do without doing
